title.narrative: Jiangxi Wuxikou Integrated Flood Management Project

description.narrative: To reduce the flood risk in the central urban area of Jingdezhen City through implementation of priority structural and non-structural measures, and contribute to establishment of an integrated flood risk management system for the City.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
International Bank for Reconstruction and Development
Jiangxi Jingdezhen Municipal Water Affairs Bureau

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section I, Part C, Project Plan and Safeguards, para 1 | Description :Jingdezhen City to apply inthe implementation of the Project and the linked activities as relevant, the RAP, the RPF, the EMP, thePMP and the DSR, all in amanner satisfactory to the Bank. Jingdezhen City to not amend, suspend, or waive any such plan or any provision thereof, withoutthe prior concurrence of the Bank. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section I, Part C, para 13 | Description :Jingdezhen City to prepare and furnish to the Bank forreview and comment, at least six months prior to the completion of the scheme, a proposed operation and maintenance plan for suchscheme, including institutional, technical and financial arrangements, and, thereafter, ensure the prompt implementation of eachsuch plan, taking into account the views of the Bank thereon. | Due Date :31-Dec-2017

Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section I, Part C, para 16 | Description :Jingdezhen City to initiate no later than 3 months afterthe effectiveness date, and to complete at least 6 months prior to fillingof the Project Dam reservoir, a study on comprehensivereservoir management and development plan, and a 2nd phase study of cumulative impact assessment in the entire Changjiang RiverBasin, and to prepare & implement an action plan based on the study results. | Due Date :30-Apr-2016

Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section I, Part C, para 17 | Description :Annual Work Plan: Jingdezhen City to prepare and provideto the Bank for review and comments the annual work plan for implementation of the project, including activities drawn from thePIP, the EMP, the RAP, the RPF, the PMP and DSR.Monitoring and Evaluation Plan: Jingdezhen City to prepare and provide to the Bankthe annual monitoring and evaluation plan for review and comments. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section I, Part C, para 7 | Description :Jingdezhen City to engage and retain the services ofindependent consultants to carry out external monitoring and reporting on implementation of the EMP, RAP and RPF annually andimplement the recommended measures in a prompt and efficient manner satisfactory to the Bank, in order to improve compliance withthe EMP, RAP and RPF. Same applies to Dam Safety Panel on design reports & Dam Safety Plans | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section II, Part A, para 1 | Description :Jingdezhen City to monitor and evaluate the progress ofthe Project according to the agreed annual work plan and prepare Progress Reports for the Project, including activities drawn fromthe PIP, the EMP, the RAP, the RPF, the PMP and DSR. Each such Project Report shall cover the period of one calendar semester, andbe furnished to the Bank by Mar 15 and Sep 15 each year, starting on Mar 15,2013 | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section II, Part A, para 2 | Description :Jingdezhen City to, not later than June 30, 2015, reviewwith the Bank (mid-term review) the progress made in the implementation ofthe Project, together with any recommendation theBorrower or the Bank may have on measures to be taken to ensure the efficient completion of the Project and to achieve theobjectives thereof. | Due Date :30-Jun-2015

Finance Agreement :PA, Schedule, Section II, Part B, para 4 | Description :Jingdezhen City to install and operationalize for usethe Procurement and Financial Management Information System no later than thirty (30) days after the Effective Date, and thereafterapply the system in order to monitor the entire procurement process and financial transactions under the Project in a mannersatisfactory to the Bank. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Project Agreement (PA), Schedule, Section I, Part A. Institutional Arrangements | Description :Jingdezhen Cityto maintain an organizational structure throughout implementation, which includes Project Leading Group, Project Management Officeand Expert Group with composition, powers, functions, funds, staffing, facilities and other resources satisfactory to the Bank. |Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: 8: Progress in DSS establishment with quality control
11: No. of people relocated with proper compensation and livelihood restoration
14: No. of staff from PMO and related bureaus (including decision makers) attend trainings and study tours (both domestic and off-shore) and pass test on project management and flood risk Mgt
Generation Capacity of Hydropower constructed or rehabilitated under the project
12: No. of people whose land was levied and properly compensated
PO-2: The flood protection level is increased from 20-year flood to 50-year flood
PO-1: Percentage of urban population protected from 1-in 50-year floods (disaggregated by gender)
PO-3: Total area subject to inundation by 1-in-50 year floods
9: No. of people participating in the flood-risk management and answered the flood-risk awareness questionnaire (disaggregated by Gender)
10: Operation & Maintenance Plan for DSS gets approved by Jingdezhen municipal government
6: Operation & Maintenance Plan for Wuxikou Flood Control Scheme gets approved by Jingdezhen municipal government
7: Progress in Master Plan development and government review and approval
15: Management Information System (MIS) is well maintained and fully utilized to generate various reports
13: Percentage of male and female displaced residents’ reporting that conditions in resettlement sites are satisfactory
